Literature.Title: D-enantiomeric peptides that eradicate wild-type and multi-drug resistant biofilms and protect against lethal Pseudomonas aeruginosa infections.
Literature.Author: de la Fuente-Núnez C, Reffuveille F, Mansour SC, Reckseidler-Zenteno SL, Hernández D, Brackman G, Coenye T, Hancock RE

Literature.Title: A short peptide with selective antibiofilm activity against Pseudomonas aeruginosa and Klebsiella pneumoniae carbapenemase-producing bacteria.
Literature.Author: Cardoso MH, Santos VPM, Costa BO, Buccini DF, Rezende SB, Porto WF, Santos MJ, Silva ON,  Ribeiro SM, Franco OL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PA14(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli O157(MIC=16µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17987(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028s(MIC=4µg/ml),Burkholderia cenocepacia 4813(MIC=>64µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae 218R(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli HB101(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPLN649(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae 1549216(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8 - =>16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LES400(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium C587(MIC=4µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPC 001825971(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae KPC 002210477(no activity data),Escherichia coli KPC 001812446(0-10% Inhibition=64µg/ml)
